verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa yabe avatare sarvāṁśa-āśraya
sarvāṁśa āsi' tabe kṛṣṇete milaya

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yabe—when; avatare—descends; sarva-aṁśa-āśraya—the shelter of all other viṣṇu-tattvas; sarva-aṁśa—all plenary portions; āsi'-coming; tabe—at that time; kṛṣṇete—in Kṛṣṇa; milaya—join.
translation: When the Supreme Personality of Godhead Kṛṣṇa appears, He is the shelter of all plenary parts. Thus at that time all His plenary portions join in Him.
